attributes.action: Stop The Continual Fuel Duty Increases and lower prices immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
When fuel was sold in Gallons, price rises where almost
     invisible, but now we have litres the rises are very
     noticeable. The price rises bought in recently mean the rise
     (if worked out in Gallons) is almost 17p per gallon. What with
     the Vehicle Excise duty and fuel costs and insurance premiums
     all rising, the disabled like me and low earners are being
     "Priced Off The Road" by this governament.
